name: Luminiel

hopeFeature.name: Not this time
hopeFeature.description: Spend 3 hope to force an adversary within Far range to reroll an attack or damage roll.

classFeature.name: PRESTIDIGITATION
classFeature.description: You can perform harmless, subtle magical effects at will. For example, you can change an object’s color, create a smell, light a candle, cause a tiny object to float, illuminate a room, or repair a small object.

classFeature.name: STRANGE PATTERNS
classFeature.description: Choose a number between 1 and 12. When  you roll that number on a Duality Die, gain a Hope or clear a Stress. You can change this number when you take a long rest.

foundationFeatures.name: PREPARED
foundationFeatures.description: Take an additional domain card of your level or lower from a domain you have access to.

foundationFeatures.name: ADEPT
foundationFeatures.description: When you Utilize an Experience, you can mark a Stress instead of spending a Hope. If you do, double your Experience modifier for that roll.

specializtionFeatures.name: ACCOMPLISHED
specializtionFeatures.description: Take an additional domain card of your level or lower from a domain you have access to.

specializtionFeatures.name: PERFECT RECALL
specializtionFeatures.description: Once per rest, when you recall a domain card in your vault, you can reduce its Recall Cost by 1.

masteryFeatures.name: BRILLIANT
masteryFeatures.description: Take an additional domain card of your level or lower from a domain you have access to.

masteryFeatures.name: HONED EXPERTISE
masteryFeatures.description: When you use an Experience, roll a d6. On a result of 5 or higher, you can use it without spending Hope.

ancestryFeatures.name: SHELL
ancestryFeatures.description: Gain a bonus to your damage thresholds equal to your Proficiency.

ancestryFeatures.name: RETRACT
ancestryFeatures.description: Mark a Stress to retract into your shell. While in your shell, you have resistance to physical damage, you have disadvantage on action rolls, and you can’t move.

feature.name: PAIRED
feature.description: +2 to primary weapon damage to targets within Melee range.

inventory: Basic Supplies (tent, bedroll, tinderbox, rations, etc.)
